events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and filed the initial claim with all necessary details.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent with expertise in auto accidents was assigned to the case to handle further communication.
The claim was formally acknowledged and the customer was informed about the next steps in the process.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police reports, and any repair estimates.
The customer submitted all requested documents including police report, damage photos, and repair quotes.
Investigation into the circumstances of the automobile collision began in order to verify claim details.
The investigation confirmed the details of the accident and liability as described by the claimant.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover vehicle damages and related expenses caused by the accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the service.
The claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment for the approved claim amount was processed and sent to the customer's designated account.
The claim was officially closed after successful completion of all required steps and payment release.
The claim documents and case files were archived as per company policy for future reference if needed.
